info.brief_description: Based on the Hentai Anime/Manga "The Pollinic Girls Attack!"
info.description:
Based on the popular Hentai Anime/Manga "The Pollinic Girls Attack!"

"In this alternate reality sex is not a reserved themeâit is not even a discrete thing. This is due to the existence of female and male pollinic humanoids, who travel just like pollen via the air and when they find a receptive human they start their process of fertilizationâor at least that's what they intend to do. It's just normal to see them everywhere and all the time during their season, and there are only few ways to avoid them, so almost everyone is caught up in the pollinic humanoids' mating allergy."

No Scat, no character death, nothing too brutal, make sure things makes sense in context and were good to go.

(http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=9298)
